entries.MST_EXTRAPASSIVESKILL_9600_DESCRIPTION: Slightly boosts BB gauge and probable slight recovery of HP when attacked
entries.MST_EXTRAPASSIVESKILL_9700_DESCRIPTION: Probable slight HP recovery and probable BB gauge boost when attacked
entries.MST_EXTRAPASSIVESKILL_9800_DESCRIPTION: Negates all status ailments & probable slight BB gauge boost from Spark damage
entries.MST_EXTRAPASSIVESKILL_9900_DESCRIPTION: Negates all status ailments & adds status ailment removal effect to BB/SBB
